acceptPage.title: Welcome to the Learning Community
acceptPage.subtitle: By joining, you're part of a growing library of AI-generated courses. Here's how it works:

community.title: Shared Learning Library
community.description: Courses contribute to a community collection that helps everyone learn.

curation.title: Quality Curation
curation.description: Our team may feature great courses in the public gallery.

attribution.title: Your Credit, Your Choice
attribution.description: Claim authorship on your gallery courses anytime.

preferences.title: Your Preferences Matter
preferences.description: Indicate whether you'd like courses considered for the gallery.

acceptPage.checkboxLabel: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service
acceptPage.mustAccept: Please review and accept the Terms of Service to continue.

versionNotice: Our terms have been updated. Please review and accept the new version.
